task.title: FindingEventInformation
task.shortdesc: Event and location information should exist for every event in the 2010 building.

taskbody.context: If someone is attending an event at the 2010 E Hennepin building, its important to find the address before hand and the dates and times for the event.

step.cmd: Turn on your digital device or browsing mechanism
step.info: Mobile phones and desktop computers are the most frequently used for searching

step.cmd: Open most recent version of the chrome browser.
step.info: This browser creates the most optimal version of the 2010 E Hennepin web site.

step.cmd: Type the URL "2010ArtBlok.com" into the URL field.
